pkgmetadata.longdescription: Vectorised Nested if-else Statements Similar to CASE WHEN in 'SQL' // Functions for vectorised conditional recoding of variables. case_when() enables you to vectorise multiple if and else statements (like 'CASE WHEN' in 'SQL'). if_else() is a stricter and more predictable version of ifelse() in 'base' that preserves attributes. These functions are forked from 'dplyr' with all package dependencies removed and behave identically to the originals.
